Description:
In the center of a vast arena stands an altar crackling with energy, surrounded by glittering treasures. Though no storm rages this deep within the temple, the sound of thunder echoes ominously. Such is the overwhelming power of the Great Bird.

As you draw closer to the altar, a sudden lightning strike crashes down, blinding you momentarily. When your vision returns, you see it: the Great Bird, magnificent and imposing, in all its glory. Its gaze locks onto you, piercing deep into your soul, silently passing judgment.

There is no escape, no place to hide. Your only choice is to step forward, toward the Great Bird, perched upon its altar, awaiting your approach.
DescriptionAction: Now, it is time to face the judgment of the Great Bird.
